title: Abjuration Spells
content: in, Ambition Domain Freedom of Movement Lv 4 Abjuration ActionLevel 4 Spell Slot Target's movement is unaffected by difficult terrain, spells or water. Bard, Cleric, War Domain, Druid, Circle of the Arctic, Circle of the Coast, Circle of the Forest, Circle of the Grassland, Circle of the Swamp, Oath of Devotion, Ranger, Zeal Domain Stoneskin Lv 4 Abjuration ActionLevel 4 Spell Slot Turn a creature's flesh hard as stone. It takes only half the damage of all non-magical Bludgeoning, Piercing, and
